fields.summary: Grep job in Single Cluster document fails

comments.body: HADOOP-11485 added shellprofile.d directory into etc/hadoop directory, so the job fails. In the document, copy etc/hadoop to hdfs://user/username/input and use hdfs://user/username/input as the input of the grep job.
v1 patch: Copy only the xml files instead of all the files/directories to fix the failure and make the operation consistent with the standalone operation.
